description:
The flames of Sengoku warfare didn`t spare southern Japan, where the Chosokabe clan fought for dominance. Learn about how the leader of Tosa province, Motochika manage to find off invasion and expand his own territory.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Henshin Da! Honoo no Bushou, Chousokabe Motochika!
Metamorphosis! The General of Flame, Chosokabe Motochika!
変身だ! 炎の武将, 長宗我部元親!
